titles: The bread of life, or Foode of the regenerate A sermon preached at Botterwike in Holland, neere Boston, in Lincolnshire. By Thomas Granger, preacher of Gods word there.
author: Granger, Thomas, b. 1578.
publisher: Printed by T. S[nodham] for Thomas Pauier, and are to be sold at his shop in Yuie lane,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
